description: Cold-blooded patience, chrome-laced synapses - nature's apex predator, now jacked into the grid.

0.name: Strip Moltbot to minimal footprint for VPS/Coolify/Ubuntu deployment
0.description: Transform crocbot from multi-platform app to lean CLI + Telegram gateway for VPS hosting

1.name: Production Hardening and Deployment
1.description: Clean technical debt, optimize Docker, harden gateway, finalize CI/CD, and clean internal docs for production readiness

2.name: Operational Maturity and Observability
2.description: Enhanced observability, monitoring, structured logging, and cleanup of remaining technical debt for sustained production operation

3.name: Upstream Features Port
3.description: Selectively port Telegram inline button model selection from upstream OpenClaw and document QMD vector memory architecture

4.name: Upstream Bug Fixes Port
4.description: Port Grammy timeout recovery and session transcript repair from upstream OpenClaw for improved stability

5.name: Upstream Build Tooling Port
5.description: Migrate from tsc to tsdown bundler, unify TypeScript configuration, enable stricter linting rules, and add convenience scripts

6.name: Upstream Security Hardening Port
6.description: Port SSRF guards, Telegram download timeouts, and path traversal validation from upstream OpenClaw

7.name: Test Suite Stabilization and CI Restoration
7.description: Fix 18 pre-existing E2E test failures, restore GitHub Actions CI pipelines, address dependency vulnerabilities, and establish a green baseline

8.name: Native MCP Client and Server
8.description: Build an in-process MCP client into the gateway/agent core supporting stdio, SSE, and streamable HTTP transports. Add MCP server mode so crocbot is callable by external AI systems.

9.name: Secrets Masking Pipeline
9.description: Add a secrets registry with masking at all output boundaries (LLM calls, tool results, streaming, logging). Agents use credentials without them appearing in context, logs, or Telegram output.

10.name: Per-Provider Rate Limiting
10.description: Add rate limiting per provider/model tracking requests/sec and tokens/sec. API key round-robin rotation. Transient error retry with exponential backoff.

11.name: 4-Model-Role Architecture
11.description: Separate model roles (reasoning, utility, embeddings) and route utility tasks to cheap/fast models for immediate cost savings with zero quality loss.

12.name: AI-Powered Memory Consolidation
12.description: LLM-driven deduplication on memory save, 4-area categorization, and post-conversation auto-extraction of solutions and key facts via utility model.

13.name: Reasoning Model Support
13.description: Native reasoning_delta stream parsing for o1/o3, DeepSeek-R1, Claude extended thinking. ChatGenerationResult accumulator, reasoning token budget tracking, and dedicated trace storage for debugging and audit.

14.name: Projects and Isolated Workspaces
14.description: Project-scoped workspaces with isolated memory, MEMORY.md, knowledge base, and prompt overrides. Project switching via CLI flag or Telegram command.

15.name: Knowledge Base Import Pipeline
15.description: CLI command to import URLs and documents into project-scoped vector knowledge base with chunking, embedding, deduplication, and categorized storage.
